title: 隻HD BIOS認到,但入WINDOW無顯示

replies.msg:
事源我有1隻SSD裝WIN10, 1隻1TB HD, 1隻3TB HD
但隻SSD 有問題,拎去維修要1個月, 所以我就買多左隻3TB HD 諗住裝WINDOW 頂到SSD整完返黎再CLONE過去
裝完WINDOW後, 舊3TB HD唔見左,入去DISK MANAGEMENT變左咁




請問各位高手,我要點樣先可以救得返呢3TB DATA

chkdsk試下？

C:\WINDOWS\system32>chkdsk
The type of the file system is NTFS.
Volume label is System.

WARNING! /F parameter not specified.
Running CHKDSK in read-only mode.

Stage 1: Examining basic file system structure ...
305408 file records processed.
File verification completed.
14703 large file records processed.
0 bad file records processed.

Stage 2: Examining file name linkage ...

Index verification completed.
0 unindexed files scanned.
0 unindexed files recovered to lost and found.

Stage 3: Examining security descriptors ...
Security descriptor verification completed.
57176 data files processed.

721731112 allocation units available on disk.

多謝回覆，但好似都係無反應
